mapper.select: select product_id, user_id, activate_time, org_id, isover_time, activate_image_url, create_time, update_time from wistron.product_maintain where product_id = #{productId}
select product_id, user_id, activate_time, org_id, isover_time, activate_image_url, create_time, update_time from wistron.product_maintain limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into wistron.product_maintain(user_id, activate_time, org_id, isover_time, activate_image_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{activateTime}, #{orgId}, #{isoverTime}, #{activateImageUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update wistron.product_maintain
user_id = #{userId},
activate_time = #{activateTime},
org_id = #{orgId},
isover_time = #{isoverTime},
activate_image_url = #{activateImageUrl},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where product_id = #{productId}
